"Rogue Units"

perturbation.changed_text:
"Rogue Units"

designates a LRU for which the same serial number has been removed from an Aircraft on three (3) or more occasions for similar discrepancies (except regarding specific services not covered by the Services and except to the extent caused by Company's Default), or four (2) NFF based on official Repair Center data within a twelve (12) Month period, with confirmation of approved trouble shooting as per the CMM and/or the AMM;
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Repair Shop' is changed to 'Repair Center' in the definition of 'Rogue Units'. This creates a contradiction in terms, because the number of No Fault Found (NFF) changes from four (4) to two (2). It becomes difficult to use this definition, with official Repair Shop (original defintion) versus official Repair Center data (this change) because different entities may be subject to this specific clause.
